attributes.action: Request to the UK government a free and a fair election in Bangladesh
attributes.additional_details: Because this is THE UK GOVERNMENT around the world everyone have big respect for uk government democracy so i and we all Bangladeshi in the uk and around the world all want to keep on eyes in Bangladesh government activities for next general elections
attributes.background: I kindly requesting to the uk government to look after Bangladesh next general election is free and fair for everyone and make sure all the voters can make their own vote

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The conduct of foreign national elections are a matter for the relevant national government, not the UK Government or Parliament.
